fields.name: ActionTaken
fields.description: The action that was taken as a response to the alert (Active, Blocked etc.)

fields.name: AlertDisplayName
fields.description: Display name of the alert type

fields.name: AlertName
fields.description: Name of the alert type

fields.name: AssociatedResource
fields.description: Azure resource ID of the associated resource

fields.name: CanBeInvestigated
fields.description: Whether this alert can be investigated with Azure Security Center

fields.name: CompromisedEntity
fields.description: The entity that the incident happened on

fields.name: ConfidenceReasons
fields.description: reasons the alert got the confidenceScore value

fields.name: ConfidenceScore
fields.description: level of confidence we have on the alert

fields.name: CorrelationKey
fields.description: Alerts with the same CorrelationKey will be grouped together in Ibiza.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description of the incident and what it means

fields.name: DetectedTimeUtc
fields.description: The time the incident was detected by the vendor

fields.name: Entities
fields.description: objects that are related to this alerts

fields.name: InstanceId
fields.description: Instance ID of the alert.

fields.name: IsIncident
fields.description: Whether this alert is for incident type or not (otherwise - single alert)

fields.name: RemediationSteps
fields.description: Recommended steps to reradiate the incident

fields.name: ReportedSeverity
fields.description: Estimated severity of this alert

fields.name: ReportedTimeUtc
fields.description: The time the incident was reported to Microsoft.Security in UTC

fields.name: State
fields.description: State of the alert (Active, Dismissed etc.)

fields.name: SubscriptionId
fields.description: Azure subscription ID of the resource that had the security alert or the subscription ID of the workspace that this resource reports to

fields.name: SystemSource
fields.description: The type of the alerted resource (Azure, Non-Azure)

fields.name: VendorName
fields.description: Name of the vendor that discovered the incident

fields.name: WorkspaceArmId
fields.description: Azure resource ID of the workspace that the alert was reported to.
